headlines.description: — Trailing Seattle in the fourth quarter, Dak Prescott and the Dallas Cowboys knew there was no way they could extend their NFL record of five consecutive 20-point wins at home to start the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Dak Prescott throws for 3 TDs, Cowboys extend home win streak to 14 with 41-35 win over Seahawks

headlines.description: — The Indianapolis Colts may start slow.
headlines.shortLinkText: Minshew throws for TD in OT as the Colts win 4th straight, down Titans 31-28

events.name: Los Angeles Chargers at New England Patriots

headlines.description: — In weather that tormented the offenses, at least the Los Angeles Chargers had their kicking game to fall back on.
headlines.shortLinkText: With pair of FGs, Chargers beat Patriots and latest hapless QB, 6-0

events.name: Detroit Lions at New Orleans Saints

headlines.description: — For a rookie tight end from a college program not known for its offensive prowess, Sam LaPorta has been a quick study in the NFL and is playing a prominent role in what could be a special season for the Detroit Lions.
headlines.shortLinkText: Sam LaPorta has career day for Lions, Saints QB Derek Carr hurt as Detroit wins 33-28

events.name: Atlanta Falcons at New York Jets

headlines.description: — The rain was falling, penalty flags were flying and the Atlanta Falcons kept slogging away.
headlines.shortLinkText: Ridder, Falcons do just enough to pull out an ugly 13-8 win over struggling Jets

headlines.description: — Forced to endure an unexpected “second halftime” after the skies opened up around Acrisure Stadium in the third quarter on Sunday, the Arizona Cardinals retreated to the locker room and tried to stay loose.
headlines.shortLinkText: James Conner scores twice against his old team, Kenny Pickett hurt as Cardinals beat Steelers 24-10

headlines.description: — Tyreek Hill wasn't surprised to see just one defender covering him. After catching a 78-yard touchdown pass, he was plenty thankful.
headlines.shortLinkText: Hill has 2 TDs as the Dolphins beat the Commanders 45-15. They're 9-3 for the 1st time since 2001

headlines.description: — Nico Collins had the best game of his career, and the Texans' defense came up huge to help Houston hand Denver its first loss since mid-October.
headlines.shortLinkText: Collins has 191 yards receiving, Ward saves game with interception as Texans beat Broncos 22-17

events.name: Carolina Panthers at Tampa Bay Buccaneers

headlines.description: — Mike Evans sprinted between two defenders into the open, snagged a pass approaching midfield, and took off for the end zone.
headlines.shortLinkText: Evans scores on 75-yard TD, tops 1,000 yards for 10th straight year; Bucs beat Panthers 21-18

events.name: Cleveland Browns at Los Angeles Rams

headlines.description: — Matthew Stafford and the Los Angeles Rams have shown since coming off their bye week that this might not be another rebuilding season after all.
headlines.shortLinkText: Matthew Stafford throws 3 TD passes as Rams win 3rd straight, 36-19 over Browns

headlines.description: — Deebo Samuel talked so much smack after last season's NFC championship game, the box score almost needed a doublecheck to confirm that — yes, the 49ers did indeed lose to the Eagles.
headlines.shortLinkText: San Francisco's Brock Purdy throws 4 TD passes as 49ers thump injured Hurts, Eagles 42-19

events.name: Kansas City Chiefs at Green Bay Packers

headlines.description: — Jordan Love showed the Kansas City Chiefs just how much he's learned since the last time he faced them.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jordan Love throws 3 TD passes, Packers beat Chiefs 27-19 for 3rd straight win

headlines.description: — Jake Browning insists his first career start was the real surprise. Everyone else would disagree.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jake Browning steals spotlight as Bengals stun Jaguars 34-31 in OT. Trevor Lawrence injures ankle
